'''Choo-Choo Cart Rest Stop''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Choo-Choo Cart Rest Stop is obtainable by buying the Gnostic Chorus package of the [[Battle Pass/Vivid Illumination|Vivid Illumination]] Battle Pass.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
